EmailTemplate.name: 4 Part Nurture.Round 4 Email 6
EmailTemplate.subject: Are These POS Facts True or False?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: True or False: Aloha offers cloud-based POS solutions. True. True or False: Aloha provides custom reporting. True. True or False: Can the power of Aloha’s technology really run your restaurant? True. True or False: Aloha is the most loved and most recognized POS system among restaurant servers, managers and kitchen staff. True. Learn more <[[https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/contact-us?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Google&utm_campaign=2021_Contacted_Nurture_Hospitality&utm_content=Email6&utm_industry=hospitality&utm_sub-industry=Restaurants]]> about our restaurant technology. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
